content: दंडिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दंड-अस्त्यर्थे इनि] Bearing or having a staff. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A Brāhmaṇa of the fourth order, a {%Saṃnyāsin%}. {@--2@} A door-keeper, porter. {@--3@} An oarsman. {@--4@} A Jaina ascetic. {@--5@} An epithet of Yama. {@--6@} A king. {@--7@} A religious mendicant (Bhikṣu). {@--8@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a poet, author of the Kāvyādarśa and Daśakumāracarita; जाते जगति वाल्नीके कविरित्यभिधाऽभवत् . कवी इति ततो व्यासे कवयस्त्वयि दंडिनि .. <ls>Udb.</ls>
दंडिन् Author of the Daśakumāracarita and Kāvyādarśa. He flourished in the latter half of the sixth century, and was a contemporary of Bāṇa, according to Mādhavācārya.
